oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sympathico-adrenal effects of endotoxaemia in cattle
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Boosman, R.
Mutsaers, C. W. A. A. M.
Dieleman, S. J.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Intradermal injection of 46 ug E coil endotoxin had no effect on the plasma cortisol and noradrenaline concentrations of four dairy cows. Mean values were similar to normal values reported in the literature. Full article published in Veterinary Record (1990) 172, 11-14
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1990; 132
